definitions: (especially with reference to an official message) written in ordinary language, rather than in code

examples.text: my telegrams also will be sent en clair from the Embassy
he knew that M would understand the implications as completely as if he had transmitted the entire message en clair

shortDefinitions: in ordinary language rather than code

definitions: (especially of an official message) written in ordinary language, rather than in code

examples.text: it was just a matter of sitting down with a pencil and marking off the en clair text from the coded message

shortDefinitions: written in ordinary language, rather than in code
